ygData.subject: Re: Server/Guild Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you all for the information.  I am looking into your suggestions right now. ... Order ... a ... a ... that ... one. ... But ... even ... than
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you all for the information. I am looking into your
suggestions right now.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, <pckitty@p...> wrote:
> We have this kinder, gentler guild on Povar server called Royal
Order
> of Norrath (www.royalorderofnorrath.com) if you ever want to go to
a
> new server. We are sort of a training guild in many ways. We have
a
> relationship with a raiding guild for those in their high 50s+
that
> want to do the hard core raids.
>
> Dagdas Darlin
> 56th degree Princess Cleric
> Povar Server
>
> On Tue, 02 Dec 2003 11:09:58 -0000
> "jersey_jager" <jersey_jager@y...> wrote:
> >I am looking for a strong active guild. I thought I had found
one.
> >It had many players they were on all the time and helped out.
But
> >they have had many players leave the guild or leave the server,
even
> >the officers. I would like a supportive guild who do things
> >together on more than a rare occasion and do not mind a semi
> >newbie. Even a small guild but who do things and are on more
than
> >once a month.
> >
> >thanks,
> >Christine
> >
> >
